name: Kernum
short_description: Kernum (KRN) is a decentralized lending platform that will allow fully private smart contract creation and collateral-based lending.
description: Kernum (KRN) is a decentralized lending platform that will allow fully private smart contract creation and collateral-based lending. Kernum is developing a platform which will be built to utilize encrypted data to develop new types of privacy apps in permissionless states. In addition, the platform will allow private business transactions and collateral-based lending.
